issue: Filament admin panel still points to a PNG that does not exist and shows the Laravel default branding instead of the mandated MOTAC/BPM identity.
recommended_action: Standardize on a scalable MOTAC asset (preferably public/images/motac-logo.svg with a PNG fallback) and configure translations for the alt text before wiring it into Filament's brandLogo().
notes: Admin panel now references public/images/motac-logo.png (PNG derivative generated from motac-logo.jpeg) per design spec.

issue: Browser notifications request a PNG filename that is missing; notifications fall back to the Laravel default icon in some browsers and violate the MOTAC branding directive.
recommended_action: Add a dedicated raster notification icon (e.g., public/images/motac-logo-32.png derived from motac-logo.jpeg) and update the JS reference while keeping alt/localization parity for any notification previews.
notes: New raster derivative public/images/motac-logo-32.png powers browser notifications.

issue: The Blade header references a PNG that does not exist even though jata-negara.svg is the approved coat-of-arms asset, leading to broken imagery on the guest/auth headers.
recommended_action: Swap the source to the existing SVG, add explicit width/height (per CLS guidance), and ensure the alt attribute pulls from new lang keys (common.jata_negara).
notes: Header now loads jata-negara.svg with explicit width/height and decoding attributes.

issue: Default Laravel mail header is still in effect; emails sent from ICTServe show Laravel branding instead of MOTAC/BPM which violates RULE #2. Vendor files must remain untouched so an override is required.
recommended_action: Publish/override the mail header in resources/views/vendor/mail/html/header.blade.php to use local MOTAC assets (SVG/PNG) with translated alt text, matching WCAG sizing requirements.
notes: Overridden via resources/views/vendor/mail/html/header.blade.php using MOTAC assets with localized alt text.

issue: Documentation still instructs developers to use the deprecated img/motac-logo.png path, which no longer exists and conflicts with the standardized images/ directory.
recommended_action: Update documentation snippets to reference images/motac-logo.svg (with PNG fallback notes) so guidance aligns with the actual assets in public/images.

issue: Same outdated asset path appears in the design guide, risking incorrect implementations when teams follow the documentation.
recommended_action: Align with the standardized public/images directory and mention MOTAC/BPM dual-logo usage per the redesign spec.

issue: Reference materials embed the JPEG without guidance on responsive usage or the new SVG/PNG derivatives, leading to inconsistent exports.
recommended_action: Update references to indicate the canonical SVG source plus the smaller PNG derivative once generated for notifications.

issue: Automated localization scaffolding still reflects the nonexistent PNG variant, which will keep recreating incorrect strings unless updated.
recommended_action: Regenerate or manually fix the localization sample to point at jata-negara.svg to keep scans in sync with production assets.
notes: Primary Blade source updated; localization snapshot will refresh on next scan run.
